data.lyric:
[ti:I Can See]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Can See - Mac Miller
[00:07.68]Lyrics by：M. McCormick/R. Taylor
[00:15.37]I'm so close I can taste it
[00:18.96]The man on the moon keep playing
[00:21.20]Practical jokes planting the mirrors and smoke
[00:23.54]That I fade away in
[00:25.19]You be complaining
[00:27.02]And I can't explain it
[00:29.06]I guess nothin' compare to the feeling
[00:31.25]The feeling amazing
[00:33.22]Now I'm switchin' location
[00:35.62]'Cause Heaven too far when you live in the basement
[00:38.56]I'm lookin' for balance I'm in an oasis
[00:41.32]Well I need somebody to save me hmm
[00:46.41]Before I drive myself crazy
[00:49.86]And now I know if life is but a dream then so are we
[01:00.85]Show me something show me something show me something
[01:06.62]And now I know if life is but a dream then so are we
[01:17.54]Show me something show me something something I can see
[01:39.69]Yeah don't tell me to stop
[01:42.47]Let me keep goin' until I cannot
[01:45.63]Life is a fantasy until you wake up in shock
[01:49.66]Hittin' the ground I'm hittin' the ground I fell from the top
[01:53.71]You never expect to drop so hold on but
[01:57.37]That just the way it goes your God don't wait for no one
[02:01.61]And when that's all you know it keep you on your toes
[02:05.66]You got so far to go but look at where you came from
[02:13.46]And now I know if life is but a dream then so are we
[02:24.35]Show me something show me something show me something
[02:29.97]And now I know if life is but a dream then so are we
[02:41.25]Show me something show me something something I can see
data.trans:
[ti:I Can See]
[ar:Mac Miller]
[al:Circles (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.68]//
[00:15.37]我近在咫尺 我可以品尝个中滋味 
[00:18.96]月亮上的人恣意玩耍
[00:21.20]无伤大雅的玩笑 坐在镜子前 吞云吐雾
[00:23.54]我渐渐消失
[00:25.19]你怨声载道
[00:27.02]我无法解释
[00:29.06]我想什么也比不上切身感受
[00:31.25]这美妙的感觉
[00:33.22]如今我四处游走
[00:35.62]当你蜷缩在地下室里 天堂遥不可及
[00:38.56]我寻找平衡  我找到一丝慰藉
[00:41.32]好吧 我需要有人救我脱离苦海
[00:46.41]在我让自己失去理智之前
[00:49.86]如今我明白 倘若人生如梦 那我们也身在其中
[01:00.85]鼓励我 让我继续前行
[01:06.62]如今我明白 倘若人生如梦 那我们也身在其中
[01:17.54]鼓励我 让我继续前行 我了然于胸
[01:39.69]别让我止步不前
[01:42.47]让我继续前进 直到我筋疲力尽
[01:45.63]人生如梦如幻 直到你大梦初醒
[01:49.66]我重重跌落在地 我从云端跌入谷底
[01:53.71]你不愿一蹶不振 那就咬牙坚持
[01:57.37]事实就是如此 上帝不为任何人停留
[02:01.61]当你悟到真谛 就会让你时刻保持警惕
[02:05.66]你还有很长的路要走 但是请你勿忘初心
[02:13.46]如今我明白 倘若人生如梦 那我们也身在其中
[02:24.35]鼓励我 让我继续前行
[02:29.97]如今我明白 倘若人生如梦 那我们也身在其中
[02:41.25]鼓励我 让我继续前行 我了然于胸
